name: Amazoness Unchained Liger
text:
"Amazoness Tiger" or "Amazoness Baby Tiger" + 1 "Amazoness" monster
Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can target 1 "Amazoness" monster you control; return it to the hand, and if you do, destroy 1 card your opponent controls. During the Battle Phase: If you declare an attack with an "Amazoness" monster; this card gains 500 ATK until the end of the Battle Phase.
